input.sentences: my daughter making the grandchildren 's easter baskets .
my grandson was so happy with how his easter basket turned out .
my other grand son took all of his stuffing out and said it looked like a birds nest .
my daughter hiding eggs in the back yard .
my grandson caught the most of all the kids today .
output.sentences: On Easter Day, a granddaughter stands at the table and readies her Easter basket for the day's festivities.
Her brother, eager to join in the tasks, picks up his basket and places stuffing inside.
Yet another brother sits at the table and puts eggs into his Easter nest.
The eggs are hidden in the backyard, and the children seek out places to find them.
Once they find their eggs, they put them in the basket and smile for their grandparents, who take photographs to remember them by.
